Katrina Chiu

Business Analyst · MSc Business Analytics · Dublin, Ireland · katrinachiu98@gmail.com

I am a Business Analyst with 2 years of experience delivering process improvements and bridging business needs with technical solutions. Skilled in data analysis, UAT, stakeholder engagement, and BI tools, I bring a sharp analytical mindset to enterprise environments. Currently pursuing my MSc in Business Analytics at Dublin Business School.

Projects

API Integration Design — Outcomes4Me x Yuka

As part of my MSc coursework, I led the requirements analysis and integration planning for a healthcare solution combining Outcomes4Me (cancer care tracking) with Yuka (product scanner). The project focused on real-time data syncing, GDPR/HIPAA compliance, stakeholder documentation, Agile sprint planning in Jira, and EVM-based budget control. Delivered a simulation of a fully integrated health ecosystem with measurable KPIs.

Service Desk & BI Reporting — BT E-Serv

Developed Excel-based dashboards and SQL queries to analyze SLA data and incident resolution trends. Automated reports cut resolution time by 36%. Led UAT coordination, defect tracking, and executive reporting. Recognized as Employee of the Month twice for analytical delivery and service improvements.
